German[edit]

Etymology[edit]

aus- +‎ steigen

Pronunciation[edit]

  • IPA(key): /ˈʔaʊ̯sʃtaɪ̯ɡŋ̩/, /ˈʔaʊ̯sʃtaɪ̯ɡən/
  • Audio (Austria)
    		(file)
  • Audio
    		(file)

Verb[edit]

aussteigen (class 1 strong, third-person singular simple present steigt aus, past tense stieg aus, past participle ausgestiegen, past subjunctive stiege aus, auxiliary sein)

  1. (intransitive) to exit
  2. (transitive) to get off
